summary: Project involves a TAYARI-branded app with an intro page featuring a teal/green gradient background. Work is ongoing to make the TAYARI logo PNG transparent (removing white/checkered background) and make the signature (जनक प्रसाद पाण्डे) smaller with no black background, so both blend with the intro page color.
architectural_notes: Intro page uses a teal/green gradient background; logo and signature images must have transparent backgrounds to blend correctly.
Use CSS mix-blend-mode: multiply and background: transparent to remove white/black boxes around PNG images.
known_issues: TAYARI logo PNG has a visible white/checkered background that does not match the intro page teal gradient.
Signature (जनक प्रसाद पाण्डे) has a black background box and needs to be made smaller.

existing_features.title: In SplashScreen.tsx, apply CSS mix-blend-mode: multiply (or equivalent technique) to the TAYARI logo image so its white/checkered background becomes transparent and blends seamlessly with the teal/green gradient background of the intro page.

In SplashScreen.tsx, make the signature image (जनक प्रसाद पाण्डे) smaller in size and remove its black background box by applying mix-blend-mode: multiply or screen so the signature blends with the teal gradient background without any black rectangle visible.
